tool_description: The Numerology API allows you to calculate information about; Attitude/Sun Number, Balance Number, Challenge Number, Karmic Debt Number, Karmic Lesson Numbers, Life Period Cycle Numbers, Lucky Numbers, Personality Number, Personal Year Number, Rational Thought Number, Soul Expression/Destiny Number, Soul Urge Number, Analyze a person's phone number, and determine the Life Path based on a person's date of birth. The API supports the Pythagorean  numerology method.
title: The Numerology API

api_list.name: Rational Thought Number
api_list.description: The Rational Thought Number endpoint calculates the Rational Thought Number based on the Pythagorean numerology method. The Rational Thought Number represents the thought patterns and mental tendencies of an individual, providing insights into their decision-making processes and approach to problem-solving.

required_parameters.name: first_name
required_parameters.description: The full first name of the person for whom the Rational Thought Number is to be calculated.

required_parameters.name: birth_day
required_parameters.description: The day of the month the person was born.

api_list.name: Subconscious Self Number
api_list.description: The Subconscious Self Number endpoint calculates the subconscious self number based on the Pythagorean numerology method. The subconscious self number represents the quantity of represented numbers in a given name, indicating an individual's capabilities and tendencies in dealing with various situations.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name used to calculate the subconscious self number.

api_list.name: Heart's Desire/Soul Urge Number
api_list.description: The Heart's Desire Number endpoint calculates the Heart's Desire Number based on the vowels in a person's full name at birth. The Soul Urge Number reflects the innermost desires and motivations of an individual.

required_parameters.name: first_name
required_parameters.description: **(required)**: The first name of the person.

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: **(required)**: The last name of the person.

required_parameters.name: middle_name
required_parameters.description: **(required)**: The middle name of the person.

api_list.name: Expression/Destiny Number Calculator (POST)
api_list.description: The Expression/Destiny Number Calculator endpoint calculates the Destiny Number based on a person's first name, middle name, and last name. It also provides information about the Destiny Number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com/destiny_number/post"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Expression/Destiny Number Calculator
api_list.description: The Expression/Destiny Number Calculator endpoint calculates the Destiny Number based on a person's first name, middle name, and last name. It also provides information about the Destiny Number.

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: The last name of the person.

required_parameters.name: first_name
required_parameters.description: The first name of the person.

optional_parameters.name: middle_name
optional_parameters.description: The middle name of the person **(optional)**.

api_list.name: Phone Number Analyzer (POST)
api_list.description: The Phone Number Analyzer endpoint analyzes a person's phone number and calculates its vibration energy based on numerology. It provides information about the overall vibration of the phone number and the minor numbers that make up the number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com/analyze_phone/post"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Phone Number Analyzer
api_list.description: The Phone Number Analyzer endpoint analyzes a person's phone number and calculates its vibration energy based on numerology. It provides information about the overall vibration of the phone number and the minor numbers that make up the number.

required_parameters.name: phone_number
required_parameters.description: The phone number to analyze.

api_list.name: Personality Number Calculator (POST)
api_list.description: The Personality Number Calculator endpoint calculates the Personality Number based on the consonants in a person's full name at birth. The Personality Number reflects certain personality traits and characteristics of an individual.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com/personality_number/post"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Personal Year Number
api_list.description: The Personal Year Number Calculator endpoint calculates the personal year number based on the provided date of birth and prediction year. The personal year number provides insights into the energies and experiences that may influence an individual during a particular year. By understanding the personal year number, users can gain awareness and make informed decisions in various aspects of their lives.

required_parameters.name: prediction_year
required_parameters.description: **(integer)**: The year for which the personal year number is calculated.

required_parameters.name: birth_month
required_parameters.description: **(integer)**: The month of birth of the person.

required_parameters.name: birth_day
required_parameters.description: **(integer)**: The day of birth of the person.

api_list.name: Personality Number Calculator
api_list.description: The Personality Number Calculator endpoint calculates the Personality Number based on the consonants in a person's full name at birth. The Personality Number reflects certain personality traits and characteristics of an individual.

required_parameters.name: first_name
required_parameters.description: **(required)**: The first name of the person.

required_parameters.name: middle_name
required_parameters.description: **(required)**: The middle name of the person.

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: **(required)**: The last name of the person.

api_list.name: Lucky Numbers (POST)
api_list.description: The Lucky Numbers endpoint generates a set of lucky numbers based on a person's birthdate and name. These lucky numbers are derived using the Pythagorean numerology method and can be used for various purposes such as lottery or decision-making. The API calculates six different lucky numbers based on different aspects of the person's birthdate and name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com/lucky_numbers/post"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Lucky Numbers
api_list.description: The Lucky Numbers endpoint generates a set of lucky numbers based on a person's birthdate and name. These lucky numbers are derived using the Pythagorean numerology method and can be used for various purposes such as lottery or decision-making. The API calculates six different lucky numbers based on different aspects of the person's birthdate and name.

required_parameters.name: birthdate
required_parameters.description: (string): The birthdate of the person in the format '**YYYY-MM-DD**'.

required_parameters.name: full_name
required_parameters.description: (string): The full name of the person.

api_list.name: Karmic Lessons Number (POST)
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the karmic lessons based on the provided full name. Karmic lessons represent the missing numbers in the name and provide insights into areas of personal growth and development. The endpoint returns the list of karmic lessons and their corresponding summaries.
api_list.code:

url = "https://the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com/karmic_lessons/post"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-numerology-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Karmic Lessons Numbers
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the karmic lessons based on the provided full name. Karmic lessons represent the missing numbers in the name and provide insights into areas of personal growth and development. The endpoint returns the list of karmic lessons and their corresponding summaries.

required_parameters.name: full_name
required_parameters.description: The full name to analyze for karmic lessons.

api_list.name: Karmic Debt Number (POST)
api_list.description: Calculates the Karmic Debt Number based on the provided birth date. Accepts query parameters for birth year, month, and day.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Attitude/Sun Number (POST)
api_list.description: The Attitude/Sun Number endpoint calculates the Attitude Number, also known as the Sun Number, which represents the initial impression or appearance we portray to others when they first meet us.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Attitude/Sun Number
api_list.description: The Attitude/Sun Number endpoint calculates the Attitude Number, also known as the Sun Number, which represents the initial impression or appearance we portray to others when they first meet us.

required_parameters.name: birth_month
required_parameters.description: The numeric value of the birth month **(1-12)**

required_parameters.name: birth_day
required_parameters.description: The numeric value of the birth day **(1-31)**

api_list.name: Life Period Cycle Numbers (POST)
api_list.description: The Life Period Cycle Numbers endpoint calculates the period cycle numbers based on the date of birth and provides meaningful descriptions for each period. It helps individuals gain insights into different phases of their lives and understand where to focus their attention during specific periods.

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Life Period Cycle Numbers
api_list.description: The Life Period Cycle Numbers endpoint calculates the period cycle numbers based on the date of birth and provides meaningful descriptions for each period. It helps individuals gain insights into different phases of their lives and understand where to focus their attention during specific periods.

required_parameters.name: birth_day
required_parameters.description: The day of birth (1-31).

required_parameters.name: birth_month
required_parameters.description: The month of birth (1-12).

required_parameters.name: birth_year
required_parameters.description: The four-digit year of birth.

api_list.name: Balance Number (POST)
api_list.description: Welcome to the Balance Number endpoint! This endpoint allows you to calculate the Balance Number based on the initials of a person's name, providing insights into their abilities, talents, imperfections, and shortcomings. The Balance Number represents a minor influence in their life and can help them maintain balance during times of emotional upheaval.

The initials of the name.
Example: **JRD** for John Robert Doe

api_list.description: The Personal Year Number Calculator endpoint calculates the personal year number based on the provided date of birth and prediction year.
